coreAttributes.name: Queen's Egg
coreAttributes.description: A small smooth egg which is produced by a queen of a spitbug hive, it has been made safe for consumption by an enchantment. It is extremely hard to obtain for obvious reasons, so is quite valuable. These eggs are supplied by "Merra Imports.Inc". "if enchantment is tampered with Merra Imports cannot be held responsible for changes to consumers body or actions that take place when said body has been changed".
